channel.title: Help
channel.description: How do I make it so you don't need a slayer level to attack Abyssal Demons and Dark Beast's ? Please tell meh ^_^

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

search for this in client.java:

if (type ==

and then add:

if (type == 1615) { if (playerLevel[18] < 85) { sM("You must be level 85 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } }

and below that:

if (type == 2783) { if (playerLevel[18] < 90) { sM("You must be level 90 slayer or higher to attack this monster."); ResetAttackNPC(); return false; } }

Read full topic
